rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.RDOMAIN

datasetVariables.label: Related Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: RDOMAIN
datasetVariables.notes: 2-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent record(s).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.USUBJID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.APID

datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
datasetVariables.name: APID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons. If APID identifies a pool, POOLDEF records must exist for each associated person (see Section 6.3, Pool Definition Dataset, and Section 4, Associated Persons Data).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.POOLID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a group of subjects that have been pooled together.
datasetVariables.label: Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: POOLID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify a specific device.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.IDVAR

datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable
datasetVariables.name: IDVAR
datasetVariables.notes: Name of the identifying variable in the general-observation-class dataset that identifies the related record(s).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.IDVARVAL

datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable Value
datasetVariables.name: IDVARVAL
datasetVariables.notes: Value of identifying variable described in IDVAR. If --SEQ is the variable being used to describe this record, then the value of --SEQ is entered here.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.RELTYPE

datasetVariables.label: Relationship Type
datasetVariables.name: RELTYPE
datasetVariables.notes: Identifies the hierarchical level of the records in the relationship. Values should be either ONE or MANY. However, values are only necessary when identifying a relationship between datasets.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELREC.RELID

datasetVariables.label: Relationship Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RELID
datasetVariables.notes: RELID value should be unique within the ID variable (e.g., USUBJID, APID, POOLID, SPDEVID) that is the subject of the relationship. All records with this ID variable that have the same RELID are considered related/associated. RELID can be any value the sponsor chooses, and is only meaningful within the RELREC dataset to identify the related/associated Domain records.

datasets.description: A dataset used to describe relationships between records for a subject within or across domains, and relationships of records across datasets.
datasets.label: Related Records
datasets.name: RELREC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.RDOMAIN

datasetVariables.label: Related Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: RDOMAIN
datasetVariables.notes: 2-character abbreviation for the domain of the parent record(s).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.USUBJID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.APID

datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
datasetVariables.name: APID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons. If APID identifies a pool, POOLDEF records must exist for each associated person (see Section 6.3, Pool Definition Dataset, and Section 4, Associated Persons Data).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.POOLID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a group of subjects that have been pooled together.
datasetVariables.label: Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: POOLID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify a specific device.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.IDVAR

datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable
datasetVariables.name: IDVAR
datasetVariables.notes: Identifying variable in the parent dataset that identifies the related record(s).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.IDVARVAL

datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable Value
datasetVariables.name: IDVARVAL
datasetVariables.notes: Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.QNAM

datasetVariables.label: Qualifier Variable Name
datasetVariables.name: QNAM
datasetVariables.notes: The short name of the qualifier variable, which is used as a column name in a domain view with data from the parent domain. The value in QNAM cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST"). \n QNAM cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. This will often be the column name in the sponsor's operational dataset. QNAM should not be the name of any standard ADaM variable.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.QLABEL

datasetVariables.label: Qualifier Variable Label
datasetVariables.name: QLABEL
datasetVariables.notes: This is the long name or label associated with QNAM. The value in QLABEL cannot be longer than 40 characters. This will often be the column label in the sponsor's original dataset.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.QVAL

datasetVariables.label: Data Value
datasetVariables.name: QVAL
datasetVariables.notes: Result of, response to, or value associated with QNAM. A value for this column is required; no records can be in a SUPP-- dataset with a null value for QVAL.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.QORIG

datasetVariables.label: Origin
datasetVariables.name: QORIG
datasetVariables.notes: Because QVAL can represent a mixture of collected (on a CRF), derived, or assigned items, QORIG is used to indicate the origin of this data.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SUPPQUAL.QEVAL

datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: QEVAL
datasetVariables.notes: Used only for results that are subjective (e.g., assigned by a person or a group). Should be null for records that contain objectively collected or derived data.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable POOLDEF.STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable POOLDEF.POOLID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a group of subjects that have been pooled together.
datasetVariables.label: Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: POOLID
datasetVariables.notes: Used to identify a result that is not assignable to a specific subject.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable POOLDEF.USUBJID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable POOLDEF.APID

datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
datasetVariables.name: APID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons.

datasets.description: A dataset that identifies individual subjects included in a pool of subjects for which a single observation record (pool level) is captured.
datasets.label: Pool Definition
datasets.name: POOLDEF

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSUB.STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSUB.USUBJID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID
datasetVariables.notes: Either USUBJID or POOLID must be populated.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSUB.POOLID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a group of subjects that have been pooled together.
datasetVariables.label: Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: POOLID
datasetVariables.notes: If POOLID is entered, POOLDEF records must exist for each subject in the pool and USUBJID must be null. Either USUBJID or POOLID must be populated.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSUB.RSUBJID

datasetVariables.label: Related Subject or Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RSUBJID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier used to identify a related subject or pool of subjects. RSUBJID will be populated with either the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSUB.SREL

datasetVariables.label: Subject Relationship
datasetVariables.name: SREL
datasetVariables.notes: Describes the relationship of the subject identified in USUBJID or the pool identified in POOLID to the subject or pool identified in RSUBJID.

datasets.description: A dataset used to represent relationships between study subjects.
datasets.label: Related Subjects
datasets.name: RELSUB

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DR.STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID
datasetVariables.notes: Study identifier of the domain record(s).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DR.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.definition: An abbreviation for a collection of observations, with a topic-specific commonality.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN
datasetVariables.notes: 2-character abbreviation, which must be "DR".

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DR.USUBJID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DR.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID
datasetVariables.notes: Sponsor-defined identifier for the device. It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, combination of identifiers) as defined in DI.

datasets.description: A special-purpose domain that contains the linkage of each subject to the device(s) to which they may have been exposed during the study.
datasets.label: Device-Subject Relationships
datasets.name: DR

priorVersion.title: Relationships between Associated Persons and Subjects

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.APID

datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
datasetVariables.name: APID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons. If APID identifies a pool, POOLDEF records must exist for each associated person (see Section 6.3, Pool Definition Dataset, and Section 4, Associated Persons Data).

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.RSUBJID

datasetVariables.label: Related Subject or Pool Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RSUBJID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier for a related subject or pool of subjects. RSUBJID may be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool. \n RSUBJID will be null for data about associated persons who are related to the study but not to any study subjects.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.RDEVID

datasetVariables.label: Related Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: RDEVID
datasetVariables.notes: Identifier for a related device. RDEVID will be populated with the SPDEVID of the related device.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable APRELSUB.SREL

datasetVariables.label: Subject, Device, or Study Relationship
datasetVariables.name: SREL
datasetVariables.notes: If RSUBJID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RSUBJID. \n If RDEVID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RDEVID. \n If RSUBJID and RDEVID are null, SREL describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the study identified in STUDYID.

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used by the sponsor to uniquely identify the study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSPEC.REFID

datasetVariables.definition: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a source of information.
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: REFID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSPEC.SPEC

datasetVariables.definition: The type of sample material taken from a biological entity.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Type
datasetVariables.name: SPEC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSPEC.PARENT

datasetVariables.label: Specimen Parent
datasetVariables.name: PARENT
datasetVariables.notes: Identifies the REFID of the parent of a specimen to support tracking its genealogy.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable RELSPEC.LEVEL

datasetVariables.label: Specimen Level
datasetVariables.name: LEVEL
datasetVariables.notes: Identifies the generation number of the sample where the collected sample is considered the first generation.

datasets.description: A dataset used to represent relationships between specimens.
datasets.label: Related Specimens
datasets.name: RELSPEC

description: This SDTM class provides a means to link related records between datasets. It includes the RELREC and SUPPQUAL datasets. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, GNRLOBSC, RELATIONSHIP, 2021-09-24)
label: Relationship
name: Relationship
